Token.Abstract: An Everlive user object that is the local representation of the user persisted to the Everlive cloud.
Returns all users from everlive.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Returns the specific user.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The id against which the user will be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Returns the user for email.

Parameter.Name: email
Parameter.Abstract: The email to get the user for.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Returns information about the currently logged in user

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token that should be passed for authentication of the request.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Sets a new password for the user with the specified username by using the secret question and secret answer

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username identifying the user

Parameter.Name: secretQuestionId
Parameter.Abstract: The secret question ID of the user

Parameter.Name: secretAnswer
Parameter.Abstract: The answer to the secret question

Parameter.Name: newPassword
Parameter.Abstract: The new password to set

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Sets a new password for the user with the specified reset code

Parameter.Name: resetCode
Parameter.Abstract: The reset code

Parameter.Name: newPassword
Parameter.Abstract: The new password to set

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Resends the verification email for the user with the specified ID

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the user

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Resends the verification email for the user with the specified username

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username for which to send verification email

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Return the current logged in user from disk.
Changes the password of the specified user.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username of the user.

Parameter.Name: oldPassword
Parameter.Abstract: The old password of the user.

Parameter.Name: newPassword
Parameter.Abstract: The new password of the user.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (BOOL success, NSError *error)

Token.Abstract: Makes an asynchronous request to log in a user with specified credentials.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: The username of the user.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: The password of the user.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Makes an asynchronous request to log in a user with facebook access token.

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token obtained from Facebook.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Makes an asynchrounous request to log in a user with live id access token

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token obtained from LiveId

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Makes an asynchrounous request to log in a user with google access token

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token obtained from LiveId

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Links the everlive account with a Facebook account

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the user

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token from the external provider

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute

Token.Abstract: Links the everlive account with a LiveID account

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the user

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token from the external provider

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute

Token.Abstract: Links the everlive account with a Google account

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the user

Parameter.Name: accessToken
Parameter.Abstract: The access token from the external provider

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute

Token.Abstract: Unlinks the everlive user account and the Facebook account

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The user id

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute

Token.Abstract: Unlinks the everlive user account and the LiveID account

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The user id

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute

Token.Abstract: Unlinks the everlive user account and the Google account

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The user id

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute

Token.Abstract: Logs out the currenlty logged in user on disk.
Signs up the user. Make sure that username and password are set. This will also enforce that the username isn't already taken.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Removes the user from everlive. Must be authenticated to remove a user.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature: (EVUser user, NSError error)

Token.Abstract: Checks if the current user is logged in.
